sentences.sContent: Unaccompanied children are not allowed on the premises.
sentences.sCn: 儿童无成人陪伴不得入内。

synos.tran: 无伴奏的；无伴侣的；无伴随的

remMethod.val: un(无) + accompan(陪伴) + ied(…的) → 无陪伴的 → 无伴随的

trans.tranCn: 无伴奏的；无伴侣的；无伴随的
trans.tranOther: someone or something that is unaccompanied has no one with them
